import React from 'react'; import { Button, ButtonToolbar, Card, CardBody, Col, } from 'reactstrap'; import { withTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; const StatusButtons = ({ t }) => (
{t('ui_elements.buttons.status_buttons')}
Use default buttons with property size
Small buttons
Use the modifier sm
Large buttons
Use the modifier lg
 ); StatusButtons.propTypes = { t: PropTypes.func.isRequired, }; export default withTranslation('common')(StatusButtons);
